item.title: How to Create an Alexa Skill with Spring Boot & Cloud Foundry
item.description: I’ve been working with Amazon’s Alexa & the Echo family of devices for the past several months and have created a couple of pretty useful and/or interesting skills. The first one I liked well enough to publish was QOTD, a Quote of the Day app that retrieves and reads a random quote per request. The second was Master Control Program, which enabled voice control of my home renewable energy system’s various inputs and controls.
